string.name: about
string.br: 1. A user cannot login until admin registered.\n \n
2. First time when you try to login using registered email and password, a verification link will be sent in your email id.\n \n
3. You can change your password using forget password options.\n \n
4. Students can find the upload option only when their guide set "Due Date and Time" for any evaluation.\n \n
5. Student can see the list of faculty under whom they can complete their project.\n \n

string.name: csvformat
string.br: SL.No | fullName | email | course | mobileNumber | password | rollNumber\n \n
SL.No | fullName | email | department | mobileNumber | password \n \n
